title: Maple Mono Build Configuration Schema
description: Schema for the build configuration of Maple Mono

enumDescriptions: Remove the features from font file
Enable the features as default ligatures

pool_size.description: The number of parallel tasks. Default is 4. When run in codespace, this will be 1

use_hinted.description: Whether to use hinted TTF as base font

ligature.description:
Whether to enable ligature.
If set to false, all the ligatures will be removed and 'ssXX' options in 'feature_freeze' will no longer effect

feature_freeze.description:
Freeze some font features (No effect on Variable font) 
 enable: Move ligature rules to `calt`, which will enable the ligatures without setting up `cvXX` / `ssXX` / `zero` in font features config, just as default ligatures 
 disable: Remove the ligature rules in `cvXX` / `ssXX` / `zero`, which will no longer effect, even if you enable it manually 
 ignore: Do nothing

cv04.description: Alternative 'l' (with bottom left bar) and '1' (without bottom bar), will be overrided by cv35 in italic style

cv33.description: [Italic Only] Alternative 'i' (with bottom left bar) and 'j'

cv36.description: [Italic Only] Alternative 'x' (without top and bottom tails)

ss03.description: Enable arbitrary tag (allow to use any case letters in all tags)

ss05.description: Restore the thickness of backslash in escape letters (\\, \', \[, ...)

ss06.description: [Italic Only] Break connected strokes between italic letters (al, ul, il ...)

ss07.description: Relax the conditions for enabling multiple greater ligatures (>>, >>>)

ss08.description: Enable double headed arrows and reverse arrows (>>=, -<<, ->>, >- ...)

github_mirror.description: Github mirror for Nerd Font, will download from https://{github_mirror}/ryanoasis/nerd-fonts/releases/download/v{version}/FontPatcher.zip

version.description: Target version of Nerd-Font. If font-patcher not exists when need to use it or there is no prebuild font for current version, will download from Github

mono.description: Whether to make icon width fixed

font_forge_bin.description:
Font Forge bin path. Default: 
 Windows: C:/Program Files (x86)/FontForgeBuilds/bin/fontforge.exe 
 MacOS: /Applications/FontForge.app/Contents/Resources/opt/local/bin/fontforge" 
 Linux: /usr/bin/fontforge

use_font_patcher.description: Prefer to use Font Patcher instead of using prebuilt NerdFont base font. If you want to custom build Nerd-Font using font-patcher, you need to set this to True

glyphs.description: Symbol Fonts settings. if is not ["--complete"], will use font-patcher to generate fonts. Full args: https://github.com/ryanoasis/nerd-fonts?tab=readme-ov-file#font-patcher

extra_args.description: Extra arguments for font-patcher, default args: ["-l", "--careful", "--outputdir", output_nf], if "mono" is set to true, "--mono" will be added, full args: https://github.com/ryanoasis/nerd-fonts?tab=readme-ov-file#font-patcher

enable.description: Whether to build Chinese fonts. Skip if Chinese base fonts are not founded

fix_meta_table.description: Fix design language and supported languages in META table

clean_cache.description: Whether to clean instantiated base CN fonts

narrow.description:
[Experimental] Whether to narrow CN characters. THIS WILL BREAK THE 2:1 METRIC
Only supported in VSCode currently

use_hinted.description: whether to hint CN font (will increase about 33% size)

use_static_base_font.description: whether to use large pre-instantiated static CN font as base font (instantiate will cost 40-50 minutes)
